metadata.synopsis: Roah finds that the Guild has already been wiped out, and she can now easily take control.
metadata.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_ATeleport to:S_LOW_Guildhall_Entrancea78a0b7b-489a-4743-9e6e-4c88f24cc2caKill the guildmembers and then ReCon:oe Debug_Guildhall_ZhentBetrayal

0.speaker: Roah Moonglow
0.text: Where did all the Guildies go...? Well, it'll make this a little easier.
0.context: NodeContext: Faint surprise at the fact that there's no one left to resist her coup.
